package.name: jimmy_gazebo
package.description: The jimmy_gazebo package contains everyting to do with gazebo with the exception of the URDF and yaml files for ros_control. I used the moore robot tutorials (see: http://moorerobots.com/blog) to learn how to use the navigation stack; so it is likely that a few lines of code from those tutorials will pop up here. If you see any issues with this pakcage please let the maintainer know. I appriciate feedback.
package.author: MO
